description: ZQ-certified Merino wool provides natural softness, temperature regulation, moisture management, and odor control, while polyester means their Men’s Merino Sport 150 Overland Adventure Short Sleeve tee will dry quickly. And with comfort features like strategic seam placement and construction that help prevent chafing, as well as a fit that gives you room to move, this tee is an all-day winner. Plus, it sports a fun adventure graphic, so it’s a step above the ordinary. Whether you’re heading to the gym or to the beach, this tee is an excellent option.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 Overland Adventure SS Graphic Tee - Mens
